document_data.name: ''Ring of Harvest''
document_data.creator: [[Thyaast Ammath]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ring of harvest''''' was a unique and powerful [[enchanted]] ring that belonged to the mad spectral [[lich]] of [[Myth Drannor]], [[Thyaast Ammath]].
document_data.Description: The ''ring of harvest'' was a band, carved of bone.
document_data.Powers: This enchanted ring allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[circle of death]]'' spell. The band held three charges of the spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''ring of harvest'' could be recovered from the laboratory of Thyaast Ammath, in the deepest parts of the [[Elven Catacombs]], by the chasm that led to the [[Underdark]].
